title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.3 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1401.3 - Location

State Regulations

Each agency shall designate the locations where records shall
be available for public inspection and copying. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1401.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
